Package com.company

Class Client

java.lang.Object
com.company.Client
Direct Known Subclasses:
CommercialClient
public class Client
extends java.lang.Object
This is client class it is used to create clients for bank
Since:
2021-4-29

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    Client()
    Constructs a client with no data
    Client​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String nationalID, java.lang.String address, java.lang.String phone, Account account)
    Constructs a client with name ,national id ,address ,phone number ,account
